metadata.notes: Updated after conversion audit. Several gaps resolved during discovery/strategy phases.

resolved_gaps.description: Previously identified gaps that have been resolved

items.resolution: Light ICP developed based on portfolio analysis. Primary: Brand Builder (lifestyle/CPG marketers). Secondary: Agency Producer.
Pricing documented: $5K minimum, $8K-$15K sweet spot, $15K-$25K+ premium range.
Dual presence - Portland & Kentucky markets. Do NOT highlight the move from Portland.
Option B selected: Subtle playfulness throughout. Mature visual execution.
Option A selected: Use 'We' (agency voice) throughout.

critical_gaps.description: Blocks downstream work - must resolve before proceeding

high_priority_gaps.description: Required before launch - significantly impacts conversion

what_is_missing: Quotes with name, title, and company
Specific feedback about experience or results
items.why_critical: Conversion audit scored Evidence at 3/5 and Trust at 3/5 primarily due to missing testimonials. Portfolio shows capability; testimonials prove satisfaction. Solution-Aware buyers rely heavily on voice-of-customer proof when comparing options.
items.impact_on_work: Affects: Homepage credibility, About page trust, Contact page conversion
items.question_to_ask: Can you reach out to 3-5 past clients (Celsius, Brumate, Samsung, Kendra Scott, MVMT) for brief testimonials? We need: their name, title, company, and 1-2 sentences about working with you.

what_is_missing: Confirmation of permission to display logos on website
Logo files (SVG or high-res PNG, monochrome versions)
items.why_critical: Client logos are primary instant credibility signal. If usage rights not confirmed, may need to remove logos at launch.
items.impact_on_work: Affects: Homepage logo bar, potential legal issues
items.question_to_ask: Do you have permission to display these client logos on your website? If so, can you provide logo files? If not, which ones should we remove?

what_is_missing: Photo that matches 'professional but approachable' direction
items.why_critical: About page bio section requires photo. Humanizes the brand for Product-Aware visitors evaluating 'who are these people?'
items.question_to_ask: When will you have the updated headshot ready? If it won't be ready by launch, can we use an existing professional photo?
items.suggested_format: Photo delivery date OR approval to use existing
items.deadline: Before launch (or use existing as fallback)

medium_priority_gaps.description: Improves quality - can launch without but conversion improves with resolution

what_is_missing: Specific lead generation goals (X inquiries per month)
items.why_critical: Cannot measure website effectiveness without defined metrics
items.question_to_ask: Six months after launch, what numbers would make you say 'this website is working'? How many inquiries per month? How many booked clients?

what_is_missing: Final selection of projects for launch
items.why_critical: Work page is the conversion driver. Need sufficient portfolio pieces at launch.
items.impact_on_work: Affects: Work page, CMS population, launch timeline
items.question_to_ask: How many projects will be ready at launch with full image sets? Can you share the list so we can prepare the CMS?

what_is_missing: Confirmation that subhead includes 'photography and video production' or similar
items.why_critical: Conversion audit flagged that aspirational headlines like 'Where Imagination Meets Reality' may not communicate what Playground does within 5 seconds.
items.question_to_ask: For the homepage headline, we recommend pairing an aspirational headline with a clear subhead like 'Creative production studio specializing in photography and video for brands.' Does this direction work for you?

low_priority_gaps.description: Nice to have - can be addressed post-launch

what_is_missing: Answers to common questions (timeline, process, budget, location)
Decision: FAQ page or FAQ section on Services
items.why_critical: Conversion audit identified no FAQ to address objections at scale. Not critical for launch but improves conversion.
items.question_to_ask: What are the 5-7 questions you get asked most often by potential clients?

what_is_missing: Whether to feature any collaborators on About page
items.why_critical: Minor - can use 'we' voice without detailing team. Addresses 'just a freelancer?' concern more explicitly.
items.question_to_ask: Do you want to feature any regular collaborators on the site, or keep it founder-focused for now?

before_launch_required.time_estimate: 15 min to send emails, then wait for responses

before_launch_required.item: Confirm logo usage rights for 8 brands
Finalize portfolio project list with images

testimonial_request_template.subject: Quick favor - testimonial for new website?
testimonial_request_template.body:
Hey [Name],

Hope you're doing well! I'm launching a new website for Playground Studios and would love to feature a brief testimonial from you if you're open to it.

Just 1-2 sentences about your experience working together would be amazing. Something like what you appreciated about the process, the quality of work, or the results.

No pressure at all - just let me know either way!

Thanks,
Barrett
